items.sentence: There might be other alternatives we haven't thought of yet.
I want to buy a car just like the one that Tom wants to buy.
Before I answer, I'd like to know why you're asking me that.
Tom translated a letter from French to English for his boss.
I guess that Tom thought that it was too late to come visit.
Tom told Mary he thought that she was behaving like a child.
Tom told Mary that he thought she was behaving like a child.
I thought that Tom said that he wasn't going to get married.
Tom told Mary he thought that she wasn't a very good driver.
We really thought that Tom was going to stay for a few days.
I'm glad that the guys who broke into your house got caught.
Tom still doesn't have the courage to tell Mary what he did.
I knew then and there that I could never get along with Tom.
Tom got a job commensurate with his training and experience.
Tom and Mary have their ups and downs in their relationship.
Tom gets very argumentative with a few beers under his belt.
Tom drank himself into a stupor when Mary walked out on him.
Tom was on edge waiting for news of how Mary's surgery went.

Tom thought the used car salesman was trying to rip him off.
